thread.title: Regina Kazman
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Regina Kazman

author: Regina Kazman
title: Regina Kazman
text: For us this was security , paying off credit cards, and some home repairs needed , not to have to worry each month , plus just had to purchase a new furnace , and that is expensive, Jason De Pasqulale was very helpful, always answered all my questions , even if he had to explain it twice .We are Senior couple , one with health problems , no children , so why not use the equity of your home to help yourself .
